mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchaseorder (postate, pocode, pocnt, ordersdate, updatedate, ordersduedate, clientid, itemid, membercode) VALUES ( #{postate}, #{pocode}, #{pocnt}, #{ordersdate},#{updatedate}, #{ordersduedate}, #{clientid}, #{itemid}, #{membercode} )
mapper.select: select * from item where itemcode like '%P%'

select count(*) from purchaseorder
and pocode like '%PO%';
mapper.update: UPDATE purchaseorder SET postate = CASE WHEN postate != '완료' THEN '취소' ELSE postate END WHERE poid = #{poid}
update purchaseorder set postate='진행' where poid=#{poid}
mapper.select: SELECT re.receiptid, cli.clientname, cli.businessnumber, cli.representative, cli.clientaddress, cli.clientphone, cli.clientfax, ship.lotnumber, item.itemname, item.origin, item.itemweight, item.itemprice, po.ordersduedate, re.etc, re.sign FROM receipt re JOIN client cli ON re.clientid = cli.clientid JOIN ship ON re.shipid = ship.shipid JOIN item ON re.itemid = item.itemid JOIN purchaseorder po ON re.poid = po.poid

select count(*) from purchaseorder
and postate = '대기'
and postate = '진행'
and postate = '완료'
and postate = '취소'

SELECT po.poid, po.postate, po.pocnt, po.pocode, po.clientid, po.itemid, cli.clientid, cli.clientname, cli.clientcode, item.itemid, item.itemname, item.itemcode, po.ordersdate, po.updatedate, po.ordersduedate, po.membercode FROM purchaseorder po JOIN client cli ON po.clientid = cli.clientid JOIN item item ON po.itemid = item.itemid ORDER BY poid DESC
